attributes.action: Support our support and give PCSO’s CS spray.
attributes.background: Acid attacks, knife crime and the threat of extremism. Give our girls and guys something to answer back with other then the gab.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Individual police forces are responsible for deciding what equipment to issue to PCSOs.

You could raise this issue with the Police and Crime Commissioner for your area, who is elected. You can find out more about Police and Crime Commissioners, including how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/police-and-crime-commissioners

You need to give your full name to start a petition.
